skins.name: Ciaccona
skins.description: An attire that is light but lacks no elegance. A gentle breeze passes by as Ciaccona plays her instrument, the rustling of the fabric of her clothes sometimes becomes the accompaniment.

tags.name: Traction
tags.description: Pulls targets within range towards a specific position

tags.name: Aero Erosion
tags.description: Utilizes Aero Erosion for combat advantage

199.name: Where Wind Sings
199.description: Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Harmonic Allegro</color> grants Ciaccona immunity to interruption for {0}s. Casting Basic Attack increases Ciaccona's ATK by {1} for {2}s.

200.name: Song of the Four Seasons
200.description: During Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Singer's Triple Cadenza</color>, Resonators in the team gain {0} Aero DMG Bonus.

201.name: Starlit Improv
201.description: Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> additionally grants <SapTag=0>{0}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=segment P=segments SapTag=0} of <te href=850061>Musical Essence</te>. Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Harmonic Allegro</color> gains 1 more charge.

202.name: Toccata and Fugue
202.description:
Ciaccona ignores {0} of the targets' DEF when dealing damage with Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Quadruple Downbeat</color>;
Ciaccona ignores {0} of the targets' DEF when dealing Resonance Liberation DMG.

203.name: Eternal Idyll to Lasting Summer
203.description:
Gain {0} Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus;
DMG taken by Resonators within and around the range of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Singer's Triple Cadenza</color> is reduced by {1}.

204.name: Unending Cadence
204.description: When in <color=Highlight><te href=850060>Solo Concert</te></color>, Ciaccona or <color=Highlight><te href=850059>Ensemble Sylph</te></color> deals <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> equal to {0} of Ciaccona's ATK to nearby targets, considered Resonance Liberation DMG.

params.name: Quadruple Time Steps
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title> Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>. Basic Attack Stage 4 inflicts 1 stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color> upon the target hit.
- When the first three stages of Ciaccona's Basic Attack are interrupted by dodging, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack in time to resume the attack cycle and cast the corresponding Basic Attack stage.
- After Basic Attack Stage 4, Ciaccona starts a <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color>. If Ciaccona's Basic Attack Stage 4 or <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color> ends early (proactively or being interrupted), an <color=Highlight>Ensemble Sylph</color> is generated.

<size=40><color=Title>Solo Concert</color></size>
When Ciaccona or Ensemble Sylph performs Solo Concert, they give 24% Aero DMG Bonus to all nearby Resonators in the team. This effect is not stackable.

<size=40><color=Title>Ensemble Sylph</color></size>
Up to 2 Ensemble Sylphs may exist simultaneously.
If Ciaccona's <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> is interrupted, the Ensemble Sylphs generated will finish the attack for Ciaccona and enter <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color>.
If Ciaccona's <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color> is interrupted, the <color=Highlight>Ensemble Sylphs</color> generated will continue the <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color> for Ciaccona.
Aside from the two situations mentioned above, Ensemble Sylphs generated by <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> will finish Ciaccona's current attack without entering <color=Highlight>Solo Concert</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to jump into mid-air and attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Aimed Attack</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Aim to enter Aiming Mode to fire charged shots, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, considered Heavy Attack DMG.

<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack after Mid-air Attack Stage 2 to cast Basic Attack Stage 4.

<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
Follow up successful <color=Highlight>Dodges</color> with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>.

params.name: Harmonic Allegro
params.description:
Move a certain distance, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> and inflicting 1 stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color> on the target upon hit.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack in time to cast Basic Attack Stage 2.
- When Ciaccona interrupts Basic Attack, Heavy Attack, Mid-air Attack, or <color=Highlight><te href=850060>Solo Concert</te></color> with Resonance Skill, an <color=Highlight><te href=850059>Ensemble Sylph</te></color> is generated.
- Ciaccona's Resonance Skill can be cast in mid-air.

params.name: Singer's Triple Cadenza
params.description:
Ciaccona and <color=Highlight><te href=850059>Ensemble Sylphs</te></color> perform an <color=Highlight>Improvised Symphonic Poem</color> together, dealing <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> once to the nearby targets and entering <color=Highlight>Recital</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Recital</color></size>
When in Recital, sound waves will periodically radiate around Ciaccona. When the sound wave overlaps with the circle indicator, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} the green or yellow buttons to generate <color=Highlight>Symphonic Poem: Tonic</color> of the corresponding color and recover a certain amount of Concerto Energy.
During Recital:
- Switching to another Resonator doesn't end Recital, but automatically generates a <color=Highlight>Symphonic Poem: Tonic</color> matching the color of the last generated Tonic before switching. A green <color=Highlight>Symphonic Poem: Tonic</color> is generated by default if no interaction input is given before switching to another Resonator.
- Ciaccona is immune to interruptions and takes {0} less DMG.
- Exit Recital by {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tapping PC=pressing Gamepad=pressing} Resonance Liberation again or switching Ciaccona back onto the field.
- <color=Highlight><te href=850059>Ensemble Sylphs</te></color> can now directly grant Aero DMG Bonus provided by <color=Highlight><te href=850060>Solo Concert</te></color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Symphonic Poem: Tonic</color></size>
Green Tonic: Deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to nearby targets and inflict a stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color> on targets hit.
Yellow Tonic: Deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> to nearby targets and inflict a stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850008>Spectro Frazzle</te></color> on targets hit.

params.name: Interlude Tune
params.description: Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Singer's Triple Cadenza</color> grants Ciaccona a Shield equal to {0} of her Max HP for {1}s. Switching out Ciaccona removes the Shield.

params.name: Winds of Rinascita
params.description: Increase <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat</color>'s DMG by {0}.

params.name: Roaming with the Wind
params.description:
Attack the target to deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color> and inflict a stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color>.
Follow up with Basic Attack in time to cast Basic Attack Stage 3.

params.name: Symphony of Wind and Verse
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat</color></size>
When there are 3 segments of Musical Essence, Heavy Attack is replaced with <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat</color>.
Consume all Musical Essence to shoot <color=Highlight>Downbeat Notes</color> forward to deal <color=Wind>Aero DMG</color>, pulling in the nearby targets and inflicting 1 stack of <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color> on the target hit.
<color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Quadruple Downbeat</color> can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.

<size=40><color=Title>Musical Essence</color></size>
Ciaccona can hold up to 3 segments of Musical Essence.
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> or <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> recovers 1 segment of Musical Essence.

params.name: Windcalling Tune
params.description: <color=Highlight><te href=850009>Aero Erosion</te></color> DMG dealt to targets near the active Resonator is Amplified by {0} for {1}s.

params.name: Tune Break: Pistols
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
